backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming removal of 'Liquidity Locked' phrases from TickerBanner.tsx, with high confidence and linked to test REQ-24.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and notable changes like removed elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based light and dark theme CSS custom properties for colors, borders, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app titled 'The Pointless Coin', mounting the app at the #root div and loading main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Navigation, HeroSection, TickerBanner, AboutSection, TokenomicsSection, HowToBuySection, CommunitySection, Footer) in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column section featuring a floating coin image with badges and humorous meme-coin copy explaining the coin's intentional lack of utility.
frontend/src/components/CommunitySection: Community section with a single X Communities social card and a large CTA banner with floating coin image and Buy/Join buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick-links navigation, a single X social icon, a legal disclaimer, dynamic copyright year, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a floating coin image, animated star particles, headline, ticker symbol, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
Displays a three-step guide (create Phantom wallet, swap SOL for $POINTLESS, hold) with icons, descriptions, and tips for purchasing the $POINTLESS token.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a logo, a 'Buy $POINTLESS' CTA button, and a responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Horizontally scrolling ticker banner that continuously displays repeated $POINTLESS-themed slogans using a CSS animation.
frontend/src/components/TokenomicsSectio: Shows tokenomics stats (1B supply, 0% team allocation) as cards and displays the contract address with a clipboard copy button.
frontend/src/components/TweetBanner.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a dark/gold theme using oklch colors, and provides utility classes for gold glows, buttons, cards, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom oklch-based color tokens (gold, dark), display/heading font families, gold box-shadow utilities, and keyframe animations for accordion, coin float, and pulse-glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 19) describing the 'The Pointless Coin' meme coin website built on Solana, listing all implemented features such as hero, navbar, about, tokenomics, how-to-buy, roadmap, and community sections.
